section: Exhibit 10.1 JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT THIS JOINT VENTURE AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") made and entered into this 20th day of Friday, March 2020 (the "Execution Date"), BETWEEN: BorrowMoney.com, inc of 512 Bayshore DR, suite 201 Fort Lauderdale FL 33304, and JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go of 4060 Johns Creek Parkway Suite H Suwanee, GA 30024 (individually the "Member" and collectively the "Members").
explanation: The agreement states the 20th day of Friday, March 2020. March 20, 2020 was actually a Friday, meaning that this is not a structural flaw. However, if the agreement says the wrong date in conjunction with the wrong day, then there is a structural flaw because the statement does not make sense.

section: Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"): Member Contribution Description Agreed Value BorrowMoney.com, inc 1, 500 square feet of Leased/rent office Space Includingspecified Description of duty* $3,500,000.00 USD JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD in cash. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: In the capital contributions section, the agreed value is identical ($3,500,000) for BorrowMoney.com, inc and JVLS, LLC even though their actual contributions are drastically different (office space vs. cash plus a percentage of revenue). This implies an inaccurate valuation of contributions and a misalignment of values.

section: 39. In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined based on the total revenue generated over the last 3 months. An appraiser will be appointed within a reasonable period of the date of withdrawal or dissolution. The results of the appraisal will be binding on all Members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be based on the proportion of their respective capital account less any outstanding liabilities a Member may have to the Venture. The intent of this section is to ensure the survival of the Venture despite the withdrawal of any individual Member.
explanation: The valuation of a withdrawing member's interest is based on the proportion of their capital account. The value of the Venture is to be determined based on the total revenue generated over the last 3 months. However, the paragraph states that 'the intent of this section is to ensure the survival of the Venture despite the withdrawal of any individual Member.' Therefore the statements contradict each other.
